content: OK. I solved this by going File/Get New Messages for... the account in question. It took several hours to download the 5700 messages from the server, but it all seems good now.
creator: firefox1865

content: This may be a McAffee issue. Antivirus software is a known problem for email. See if McAffee has an override to bypass email interference.
creator: davidsk

content:
Assuming you mean a gmail account, do this: - check account settings>synchronization&storage and verify that 'synchronize all messages regardless of age' is checked - click file>offline>download to ensure all message content is downloaded - all messages will now be on your PC. if you wish to save separately, then do these steps: 

 -- install the addon 'importexportools NG'  -- highlight the message folder, rightcllck and select importexport option to export mbox  -- now, highlight Local Folders, rightclick and select importexport option to import

- you will now have all messages in local folders and the gmail account can be removed, if desired.
creator: davidsk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
